---
name: Smoothiebuzz
website: https://www.instagram.com/smoothiebuzz_nj/
blurb: We're a food truck located in Monmouth County serving up caffeinated smoothies for all of NJ.
showMore: true
---

Fueled by the desire to keep you going! We're a food truck located in Monmouth County serving up caffeinated smoothies for all of NJ. All smoothies are made to order and provide a full serving of fruits and veggies. Non-caffeinated smoothies available for the kiddos, too!
